renderpass.code:
// regolfing 697 chars https://shadertoy.com/view/MdVcRd

// starting to get a bit obfuscated...

#define P(i,j,b)     vec2(.3, b ).xyxx * smoothstep(0., 9./R.y, .1 - abs(i) - abs(j) ) //
#define C          + P(x+=.5, y+.3, s/50) + P(x, y-.3, s/50) //
#define X(a,x,y,b) + P( a x - clamp( x, 0., .5 ), y, b&1 )   //
#define Z(n)         D( i.n % 10 )  D( i.n / 10 )            //
#define D(n)         X(++, x,  y,     892>>n )           \
                     X(, x,    y-.7, 1005>>n )           \
                     X(, x,    y+.7,  877>>n )           \
                     X(, y-.1, x+.1,  881>>n )           \
                     X(, y-.1, x-.6,  927>>n )           \
                     X(, y+.6, x+.1,  325>>n )           \
                     X(, y+.6, x-.6, 1019>>n )          //
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) {
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,
          U = 3.* ( u+u-R ) / R.y;
    float y = --U.y,
          x = U.x - y * .2 - 3.;
    ivec4 i = ivec4(iDate);  i.y++;
    int   s = int( iDate.w * 1e2 ) % 100;
                                                         
    O  = Z(w    % 60) C
         Z(w/60 % 60) C
         Z(w/3600);

    x = x/.6 - 14., y = y/.6 + .53, R *= .6;
    O += Z(w*0+s);
                                                         
    x -= .8, y += 3.;
    O += Z( z )  X(++,x,y,1)
         Z( y )  X(++,x,y,1)
         Z( x % 100 ) Z( x / 100 ); }                    /*






/* // --- 627 chars

#define P(i,j,b)   vec2(.3, b&1 ).xyxx * smoothstep(0., 9./R.y, .1 - abs(i) - abs(j) ) //
#define S(x)       clamp( x, 0., .5 )                   //
#define C        + P(x+=.5, y+.3, s/50) + P(x, y-.3, s/50) //
#define H(b)     + P( ++x - S(x), y, b )                //
#define X(x,y,b) + P(   x - S(x), y, b )                //
#define Z(n)       D(n % 10)  D(n / 10)                 //
#define D(n)                H(     892>>n )              \
                   X( x,    y-.7, 1005>>n )              \
                   X( x,    y+.7,  877>>n )              \
                   X( y-.1, x+.1,  881>>n )              \
                   X( y-.1, x-.6,  927>>n )              \
                   X( y+.6, x+.1,  325>>n )              \
                   X( y+.6, x-.6, 1019>>n )             //
#define mainImage(O,u)                                   \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                            \
          U = 3.* ( u+u-R ) / R.y;                       \
    float y = --U.y,                                     \
          x = U.x - y * .2 - 3.;                         \
    ivec4 i = ivec4(iDate);                              \
    int   t = i.w,                                       \
          s = int( iDate.w * 1e2 ) % 100;                \
                                                         \
    O  = Z(t    % 60) C                                  \
         Z(t/60 % 60) C                                  \
         Z(t/3600);                                      \
                                                         \
    x = x/.6 - 14., y = y/.6 + .53, R *= .6;             \
    O += Z(s);                                           \
                                                         \
    x -= .8, y += 3.;                                    \
    O += Z( i.z )      H(1)                              \
         Z((i.y + 1))  H(1)                              \
         Z( i.x % 100) Z(i.x / 100)                     /*






/* // --- 634 chars


#define P(i, j, b)  vec2(.2, b&1 ).xyxy * smoothstep(0., 9./R.y, .1 - abs(i) - abs(j) )
#define S(x)        clamp( x, 0., .5)
#define C           + P(x+=.5, y + .3, b/50) + P(x, y - .3, b/50)
#define H(b)        + P( ++x - S(x)   , y  , b ) 
#define Y(x, y, b)  + P(  y- S(y) , x, b ) 
#define Z(n)          D(n % 10)  D(n / 10)

#define D(n)            H( 892>>n)    \
              Y( y-.7, x, 1005>>n)    \
              Y( y+.7, x,  877>>n)    \
              Y(x+.1, y-.1,  881>>n)  \
              Y(x-.6, y-.1,  927>>n)  \
              Y(x+.1, y+.6,  325>>n)  \
              Y(x-.6, y+.6, 1019>>n)

#define mainImage(O,u)                                   \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                            \
          U = 3.* ( u+u-R ) / R.y;                       \
    float y = --U.y,                                     \
          x = U.x - y * .2 - 3.;                         \
    ivec4 i = ivec4(iDate);                              \
    int   t = i.w,                                       \
          b = int( iDate.w * 1e2 ) % 100;                \
                                                         \
    O  = Z(t    % 60) C                                  \
         Z(t/60 % 60) C                                  \
         Z(t/3600);                                      \
                                                         \
    x = x/.6 - 14., y = y/.6 + .53, R *= .6;             \
    O += Z(b);                                           \
                                                         \
    x -= .8, y += 3.;                                    \
    O += Z( i.z)       H(1)                              \
         Z((i.y + 1))  H(1)                              \
         Z( i.x % 100) Z(i.x / 100)                     /*






/* // --- 652 chars

#define P(i, j, b)  vec2(.2, b&1 ).xyxy * smoothstep(0., 9./R.y, .1 - abs(i) - abs(j) )
#define S(x)        clamp( x, 0., .5)
#define C           + P(x+=.5, y + .3, b/50) + P(x, y - .3, b/50)
#define H(b)        + P( ++x - S(x)   , y  , b ) 
#define X(   j, b)  + P(   x - S(x)   , y-j, b ) 
#define Y(i, j, b)  + P(  y-j- S(y-j) , x-i, b ) 
#define Z(n)          D(n % 10)  D(n / 10)

#define D(n)           H( 892>>n)  \
              X(     .7, 1005>>n)  \
              X(    -.7,  877>>n)  \
              Y(-.1, .1,  881>>n)  \
              Y( .6, .1,  927>>n)  \
              Y(-.1,-.6,  325>>n)  \
              Y( .6,-.6, 1019>>n)

#define mainImage(O,u)                                   \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                            \
          U = 3.* ( u+u-R ) / R.y;                       \
    float y = --U.y,                                     \
          x = U.x - y * .2 - 3.;                         \
    ivec4 i = ivec4(iDate);                              \
    int   t = i.w,                                       \
          b = int( iDate.w * 1e2 ) % 100;                \
                                                         \
    O  = Z(t    % 60) C                                  \
         Z(t/60 % 60) C                                  \
         Z(t/3600);                                      \
                                                         \
    x = x/.6 - 14., y = y/.6 + .53, R *= .6;             \
    O += Z(b);                                           \
                                                         \
    x -= .8, y += 3.;                                    \
    O += Z( i.z)       H(1)                              \
         Z((i.y + 1))  H(1)                              \
         Z( i.x % 100) Z(i.x / 100)                     /*






/* // --- 664 chars

#define P(i, j, b)  vec2(.2, b&1 ).xyxy * smoothstep(0., 9./R.y, .1 - abs(i) - abs(j) )
//#define S(i, j, b)  P( - clamp( I=i, 0., .5) + I , j, b ) 
#define S(x)        clamp( x, 0., .5)
#define C           O += P(x+=.5, y + .3, b/50) + P(x, y - .3, b/50); t /= 60
#define H(b)        O += P( ++x - S(x)   , y  , b ) 
#define X(   j, b)       P(   x - S(x)   , y-j, b ) 
#define Y(i, j, b)       P(  y-j- S(y-j) , x-i, b ) 
#define Z(n)        ; D(n % 10) ; D(n / 10) ;

#define D(n)           H( 892>>n)  \
            + X(     .7, 1005>>n)  \
            + X(    -.7,  877>>n)  \
            + Y(-.1, .1,  881>>n)  \
            + Y( .6, .1,  927>>n)  \
            + Y(-.1,-.6,  325>>n)  \
            + Y( .6,-.6, 1019>>n)

#define mainImage(o,u)                                   \
    vec4  O = o;                                         \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                            \
          U = 3.* ( u+u-R ) / R.y;                       \
    float y = --U.y,                                     \
          x = U.x - y * .2 - 3.;                         \
    ivec4 i = ivec4(iDate);                              \
    int   t = i.w,                                       \
          b = int( iDate.w * 1e2 ) % 100                 \
                                                         \
    Z(t % 60) C                                          \
    Z(t % 60) C                                          \
    Z(t)                                                 \
                                                         \
    x = x/.6 - 14., y = y/.6 + .53, R *= .6              \
    Z(b)                                                 \
                                                         \
    x -= .8, y += 3.                                     \
    Z( i.z)       H(1)                                   \
    Z((i.y + 1))  H(1)                                   \
    Z( i.x % 100) Z(i.x / 100)                           \
    o = O                                               /*
